thread.title: Super Bowl 51 was briefly delayed because two helmets got stuck together
thread.title_full: Super Bowl 51 was briefly delayed because two helmets got stuck together

author: Harry Lyles Jr.
title: Super Bowl 51 was briefly delayed because two helmets got stuck together
text: Super Bowl 51 was briefly delayed because two helmets got stuck together Well this was weird. The Falcons and Patriots aren’t playing one of the more close Super Bowls that we’ve seen. The Falcons were up 28-3 late in the third quarter. This might be as close as the game gets all night: Dwight Freeney and Martellus Bennett’s helmets got stuck together, and both players had to take them off at the same time in order to get them dislodged. The Patriots would finish off that drive and make it a 28-9 game after a missed extra point. In this Storystream
